inclusion.criterion: clinical exacerbation of a known or suspected COPD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intubation and invasive mechanical ventilation since less than 72 hrs.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ACV or CV mode (VT 8 ml/kg, RR 12/min., PEEP : 0 cmH20)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pH < 7.30 and PaCO2 > 55 mm Hg and PEEPi (end-expiratory occlusion) > 5 cmH20
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: written inform consent (patient, patient's legal surrogate)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: affiliation to a social security regime
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia, but no other exclusion criteria are mentioned.
